backend/main.mo: Defines user profile with KYC fields, enforces access control, and provides CRUD-style functions for callers to view and save their own profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old user profiles to the new KYC-enabled format by adding empty KYC fields during upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs for several UI and backend-related updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries of many frontend files for build planning.
frontend/.env.development.example: Development environment template configuring backend mode and REST base URL.
frontend/.env.example: Default environment template specifying backend mode and optional REST API URL.
frontend/.env.staging.example: Staging environment template using REST mode with a staging backend URL.
frontend/.vscode/extensions.json: VS Code extension recommendations for formatting, linting, Tailwind, Motoko, and Git utilities.
frontend/.vscode/tasks.json: VS Code task definitions for installing deps, running frontend dev/staging, starting DFX, deploying backend, and building the frontend.
frontend/admin-portal/.env.example: Example environment template defining backend mode, URLs, canister ID, and environment for the admin portal.
frontend/admin-portal/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the admin React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/admin-portal/README.md: Documentation describing the admin portal’s purpose, features, environment setup, and development instructions.
frontend/admin-portal/src/AdminApp.tsx: Initializes routing, theming, authentication, and global UI providers for the admin portal.
frontend/admin-portal/src/backend/adminB: Placeholder backend client supporting IC or REST modes for future admin operations.
frontend/admin-portal/src/components/aut: Route guard that restricts access to authenticated admin users and handles redirects.
frontend/admin-portal/src/components/lay: Header component showing branding, theme toggle, user menu, and logout for admins.
Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main content area for admin pages.
frontend/admin-portal/src/config/env.ts: Loads and validates admin-specific environment variables for backend mode and settings.
frontend/admin-portal/src/contexts/Admin: LocalStorage-based admin authentication system handling login, signup, session persistence, and logout.
frontend/admin-portal/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React admin app and renders AdminApp into the root element.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AccessDe: Displays an access-denied message with an option to return to login for unauthorized users.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminDas: Admin dashboard showing basic system stats and introductory information for future features.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminFor: React page that handles admin password reset request, showing a form and confirmation message after submission.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminLog: Admin login page with email/password form, loading state, error handling, and redirect on successful authentication.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminSig: Admin signup page with validation for name, email, password, and confirmation, submitting to create a new admin account.
frontend/admin-portal/src/styles/admin.c: CSS file importing the project's main index.css for admin styling.
frontend/DELIVERY_PLAN_BATCHES.md: Outlines ordered batches for assembling the project, detailing shared configs, user portal, admin portal, backend integration, and pages.
frontend/docs/GITHUB_ONBOARDING.md: Guide for setting up a GitHub repo and initializing Git for the project.
frontend/docs/LOCAL_DEVELOPMENT.md: Instructions for installing dependencies and running the project locally in IC or REST modes.
frontend/docs/VSCODE_SETUP.md: Recommended VS Code extensions and setup guidance for development.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining color variables, themes, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry file mounting the app and loading the main React script.
frontend/README.md: Project overview explaining user/admin portals, setup steps, environment usage, and development instructions.
frontend/REST_BACKEND_CONTRACT.md: Specifies the full REST API contract and security requirements for a Node.js backend used in REST mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring routes, providers, layouts, and protected routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/backendClient/config.ts: Reads environment variables to configure backend mode and REST base URL, validating values and providing defaults.
frontend/src/backendClient/icClient.ts: Implements BackendClient for IC mode, delegating profile operations to the actor and returning mock data for all other features.
frontend/src/backendClient/index.ts: Factory that returns either an IC or REST backend client based on configuration, with caching and mode-based invalidation.
frontend/src/backendClient/restClient.ts: Implements BackendClient for REST mode using fetch, handling auth, BigInt serialization, errors, and all API operations.
frontend/src/backendClient/types.ts: Defines the BackendClient interface and related types to unify IC and REST backend implementations.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Protects routes by redirecting unauthenticated users and displaying a loading state while authentication is checked.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/GoldSi: UI card that displays dummy gold and silver rates with selectable city, karat, and weight options.
Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component showing branding, copyright, and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, theme toggle, authentication controls, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Implements a demo localStorage-based auth system with signup, login, logout, and session persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a canister actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend API calls with React Query, supporting both REST and IC modes for user data, balance, statements, and transactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Syncs theme settings with backend preferences and handles updating user settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and app-wide light/dark theme CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays account overview with balance, financial health metrics, and charts using data from backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the user's dashboard with balance, recent transactions, quick navigation actions, and gold/silver rates. Fetches user profile, balance, and statements via query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Implements a simple password reset flow where users submit their email and receive a demo confirmation message. Provides navigation back to login.
frontend/src/pages/GoldSilverRatesPage.t: Shows gold and silver rates using a reusable rates card and provides explanatory information about metal pricing and karat details.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles user login with email and password, showing errors and redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard. Includes form validation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/MarketInsightsPage.ts: Displays simulated Indian market data, including asset summaries and a detailed table view, with loading skeletons and informational warnings.
frontend/src/pages/MutualFundsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays simulated mutual fund data with performance metrics, offering both card summaries and a detailed table view.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: Renders the user profile settings UI, allowing display name updates and theme toggling while handling profile loading and mutation states.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Implements the signup form with validation, authentication flow, and saving of extended KYC profile data before redirecting to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/StatementsPage.tsx: Displays account statements with filters, search, date range handling, and CSV export functionality using transaction queries.
frontend/src/pages/StocksPage.tsx: Shows simulated stock market data with summary cards and a detailed table, supporting loading states and formatted price/change displays.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines shared TypeScript types for transactions, settings, market data, mutual funds, and stocks used across the frontend.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Exports a list of transactions to a downloadable CSV file with formatted fields and proper escaping.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides INR currency formatting helpers for bigint and decimal values.
frontend/src/utils/jsonBigint.ts: Implements JSON helpers that serialize bigints as strings and parse them back based on known bigint field names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations for the frontend theme.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current phase requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and asset guidelines used for planning ongoing updates.
